sections.heading: buildings; works of art; how displayed
sections.text: The works of art acquired pursuant to the provisions of sections 82-317 to 82-329, 85-106 to 85-106.03, and 85-304 to 85-304.03 shall be displayed in areas of the buildings open to the public.SourceLaws 1978, LB 664, ยง 19.

82-327.Public buildings; works of art; how displayed.

The works of art acquired pursuant to the provisions of sections 82-317 to 82-329, 85-106 to 85-106.03, and 85-304 to 85-304.03 shall be displayed in areas of the buildings open to the public.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 664, ยง 19.
